name: Aether
description: Harnesses the energy of all forces unknown, tapping into the cosmic and mystical.

name: Analyze
description: The ability to examine and break down information or situations critically.

name: Arithm
description: Manipulates reality through the knowledge of numeracy, equations, and numerical patterns.

name: Composure
description: Maintaining calm and control under pressure or in stressful situations.

name: Computers
description: Proficiency in using and understanding computer systems and software.

name: Craft
description: Skill in creating or repairing items through various methods and materials.

name: Current Events
description: Awareness and knowledge of recent happenings and news.

name: Deceive
description: The art of lying, misleading, or tricking others.

name: Destroy
description: Amplifies destructive capabilities, enhancing the ability to cause harm and deal death.

name: Endure
description: The capability to withstand physical or mental stress and hardships.

name: Exert
description: Use your physical prowess to overwhelm & overcome.

name: Focus
description: Concentration and mental discipline to maintain attention on a task.

name: Forma
description: Encompasses shaping and transfiguration, altering forms and structures.

name: Grapple
description: Techniques for engaging in close combat and securing holds on an opponent.

name: Implements
description: Proficiency in using tools and devices for various purposes.

name: Inferno
description: Commands fire and flame, igniting and controlling blazes.

name: Insight
description: The ability to understand and interpret the true nature of people and situations.

name: Intimidate
description: Using fear or threats to influence others' actions.

name: Intuit
description: Enhances perception and insight, allowing for extraordinary understanding and instinctive knowledge.

name: Investigate
description: The skill of searching for information, clues, and evidence.

name: Lead
description: The ability to guide, direct, and inspire others.

name: Legerdemain
description: Skill in sleight of hand and performing tricks or feats of dexterity.

name: Linguistics
description: Knowledge and understanding of languages and their structures.

name: Luck
description: Increases serendipity and chance, making favorable outcomes more likely and reducing mishaps.

name: Lux
description: Wields light and illumination, creating and controlling brilliance.

name: Martial Arts
description: Training and expertise in hand-to-hand combat techniques.

name: Mentis
description: Utilizes the mind in all aspects, from illusions and telepathy to psychic attacks.

name: Mori
description: Governs death, dying, and undeath, influencing the end of life and the afterlife.

name: Navigate
description: The ability to plan and follow a route, whether on land, sea, or air.

name: Nihil
description: Channels the energy of the void, the absolute nothingness.

name: Nox
description: Masters darkness and shadow, concealing and manipulating gloom.

name: Operate
description: Proficiency in controlling and managing machinery and vehicles.

name: Persuade
description: The art of convincing others to agree or take action.

name: Pilot
description: The skill of flying aircraft or operating other complex vehicles.

name: Research
description: The ability to systematically investigate and gather information.

name: Resist
description: Fortifies defenses against various forms of harm, providing exceptional resilience and endurance.

name: Rime
description: Controls cold, ice, and frost, bringing chills and freezing environments.

name: Science
description: Knowledge and application of scientific principles and methods.

name: Shoot
description: Proficiency in using ranged weapons, such as firearms or bows.

name: Squall
description: Commands winds, air, and the skies, summoning gusts and atmospheric forces.

name: Stealth
description: The ability to move quietly and unseen.

name: Streetwise
description: Practical knowledge and experience of urban life and its challenges.

name: Strike
description: Skill in delivering effective blows in combat.

name: Survival
description: The ability to endure and thrive in harsh or wilderness environments.

name: Tactics
description: The art of planning and executing strategies in various situations.

name: Tellus
description: Manipulates earth, stone, and plants, shaping the natural and solid world.

name: Tempest
description: Unleashes lightning, thunder, and the storm.

name: Throw
description: Proficiency in accurately throwing objects or weapons.

name: Torrent
description: Wields water and rain, directing and forming aquatic flows.

name: Tumble
description: Skill in acrobatics and performing rolls, flips, and other agile movements.

name: Vivus
description: Governs life, restoration, and healing, mending wounds and revitalizing the living.

name: Perceive
description: The use of innate senses such as sight, smell, and hearing to notice and interpret details in the environment.

name: Plaga
description: Encompasses affliction, poison, plagues, and the infliction of suffering.

name: Phylla
description: Governs plants, trees, and the natural growth of flora.

name: Bellor
description: Encompasses the forces of war, hostility, battle, and violence.

name: Ordi
description: Governs order, peace, and the enforcement of law.

name: Veri
description: Of blood that flows.

name: Locus
description: Encompasses position, spatial relation, and movement.

name: Aevum
description: Time as a single, limitless entity.
